footer.text: At MYCN, we are a premier logistics provider committed to delivering efficient and dependable shipping solutions tailored to our customers' needs. Leveraging cutting-edge technology and a customer-centric approach, we ensure seamless and timely delivery experiences across the globe.

profile.welcomeText: Welcome to MYCN - Your Gateway to Chinese Shopping

address.title: Your Dedicated MYCN China Shipping Hub
sections: Your exclusive MYCN China locker address is now ready for use! Shop effortlessly from any Chinese online store.
Simply enter your unique MYCN address during checkout to have purchases delivered directly to your secure personal locker.

benefits.heading: Key Benefits:
items: 45 days of COMPLIMENTARY storage with complete transparency
benefits.footer: Our smart solutions maximize your savings on global shipping costs.

profile.newPackagesSubtitle: Drag, drop, and dominate your deliveries. Organize up to {{maxPackages}} packages into one smart shipment to save time, space, and international shipping costs. Your package control center just got an upgrade.

common.termsDescription: Please read our terms and conditions carefully before using MYCN services. By registering or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms regarding shipping, storage, payments, and more.
common.privacyDescription: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how MYCN collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our services. By using our platform, you consent to our data practices as described.

address_modal.text: First and last name must match the government-issued ID of the person receiving the shipment.

orderModel.title: You're almost ready to ship!
orderModel.text: Simply select your desired destination, choose the shipment type that best suits your needs, and confirm your payment. Once completed, sit back and track your package as it makes its way to its destination.

about.visionText: We envision a seamless global marketplace where individuals and businesses can shop and ship across borders without barriers — anytime, anywhere.
about.missionText: Our mission is to simplify and empower global logistics by providing reliable, cost-effective, and user-friendly solutions tailored to the needs of every customer.
about.valuesText: We are driven by transparency, trust, and innovation. Our values reflect a strong commitment to customer satisfaction, operational excellence, and continuous improvement in everything we do.
about.title: What our customers say
about.subtitle: Testimonials
about.workProcessDescription: We always follow the best ways of logistics
about.howTitle: Three steps to more efficient shopping
about.experiencesTitle: Trusted by clients for decades of success

step1.title: Create your address
step1.link: Get your personal shipping address in China
step1.description: And start importing your products with ease

step2.title: Shop your items
step2.description: Order from any Chinese store and ship to your new address — or let us purchase for you

step3.title: Receive your shipment
step3.description: We’ll consolidate your items, pack them, and ship straight to your warehouse safely

shippingCalculator.title: Shipping Cost Calculator
shippingCalculator.subtitle: Quickly estimate your shipping fees based on destination, weight, and delivery preferences.
shippingCalculator.note: If you would like to ship a full container, please
shippingCalculator.note2: please enter the dimensions to calculate the price accurately.
instructions: Enter your package's weight and dimensions to get an estimated shipping cost and check carrier availability in your region.
Keep in mind that any changes to weight, size, declared value, or item classification may affect your final shipping quote.
Shipping costs may vary depending on the selected shipping method, destination country, and applicable customs or duties.
Make sure your package details are accurate to avoid delays or additional fees.
Estimated delivery times and shipping rates are provided by carriers and may be subject to change due to external factors.
For high-value or fragile items, consider adding insurance or opting for a premium shipping service.

package.title: MYCN's Package Consolidation
package.description: Consolidate your packages into one shipment and enjoy lower fees, faster delivery, and more convenience.

repacking.title: MYCN Repacking Service
repacking.description: Combine your packages into one shipment and enjoy lower fees, faster delivery, and more convenience.
repacking.itemDescription: For users who want to ship only one item, we can prepare the shipment as it is or with some adjustments based on your preferences. You can choose to ship with the original seller's packaging or take advantage of our repacking service for more efficiency.
repacking.exampleDescription: If you purchase an iPhone, we can remove the seller's shipping box and repack it into a smaller, more compact box. We can also add extra padding for protection and ensure it arrives safely.
repacking.note: These adjustments not only save on shipping costs but also provide better protection during transit.
repacking.costDescription: MYCN's repacking service costs $5. While there is a small fee, the savings from reducing the shipment size often outweigh the cost. If we cannot optimize the packaging, the $5 fee will be waived.
repacking.careDescription: We handle all items, especially fragile or high-value products, with the utmost care. You can choose to keep the original seller's packaging or request additional protection for your peace of mind.
repacking.shipDescription: If you prefer to keep the seller's original packaging, you can opt for shipping as is with no changes. However, if the shipment contains a hazardous product (hazmat), additional steps may be required to ensure compliance with shipping regulations.

restricted.title: Restricted & Special Handling Items
restricted.description: Some items require special care or may be restricted due to shipping regulations. Learn what can and cannot be shipped, and how we handle them.
restricted.hazmatDescription: Items like perfumes, sprays, batteries, and flammable materials require special packaging and compliance with international regulations. We ensure all hazmat shipments meet safety standards.
restricted.fragileDescription: We provide extra padding and protective wrapping for fragile items such as glassware, electronics, and ceramics to ensure they arrive in perfect condition.
restricted.prohibitedDescription: Certain items are strictly prohibited from international shipping, including firearms, explosives, and illegal goods. Please check our prohibited items list before placing your order.
restricted.hazardousMaterialsTitle: How to Handle and Ship Hazardous Materials?
restricted.hazardousMaterialsDescription: The MYCN team carefully inspects all items before shipment. If we identify any items that require special handling (hazardous items), your shipment will require special procedures. Here's what you can expect:
restricted.hazardousStep1: We provide specialized packaging and labeling to ensure safe delivery of hazardous materials.
restricted.hazardousStep2: A fee of $12.50 applies for the additional handling and preparation of each hazardous material shipment.
restricted.hazardousStep3: Shipping options for hazardous materials may be limited. We can assist you in finding the best available carrier.
restricted.contactSupport: Contact MYCN Support via chat or email at
restricted.contactNote: Please contact customer support if you're unsure whether your item is allowed or needs special handling.

transportationTitle: A variety of trusted transportation methods for every shipment
